channel.title: How do i add menus?
channel.description: i want to add menus like type ::menu and it opens a menu to read. i know how to edit them but I don't know how to add them.

item.title: How do i add menus?
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

You have 2 add a interface.

Here is a litle example:

This will show you that you just completed a quest and shows the rewards.

public void showQuestCompleted(String questName, int rewardqp) { totalqp += rewardqp; showInterface(297); sendQuest("Congratulations!", 299); sendQuest("Close Window", 300); sendQuest("You are awarded", 6156); sendQuest("Earned QP:", 6158); sendQuest("Total QP:", 303); sendQuest("You have completed " + questName, 301); sendQuest("" + rewardqp, 4444); sendQuest("" + totalqp, 304); }

So as you can see , you have 2 work with interfaces and “SendQuest” Codes.

Read full topic
